channel.title: [help]changing ip on clients
channel.description:
hey guys , ;D i need just a bit of help , i need to change the IP. on this client that i am going to use for my server , how do i do it? :confused:
[size=35pt][font=Verdana][u][b]any help will be appreciated thank-you ![/b][/u][/font] [/size]
-_Thib

item.title: [help]changing ip on clients
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Does it have an EGUI.java?

If so, it should look like this.

[code]import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Cursor;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import javax.swing.*;

public class EGUI
{
public static void main(String args[])
{
client.main(new String[] {
“”, “”, “”
});
}
}[/code]

Between the ""s, add the ip, or change it if it is already there.

So…

[code]import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Cursor;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import javax.swing.*;

public class EGUI
{
public static void main(String args[])
{
client.main(new String[] {
“yourserver.no-ip.info”, “yourserver.no-ip.info”, “yourserver.no-ip.info”
});
}
}[/code]

Read full topic
